product_overview: Vibe Olympics is a comprehensive online platform offering a digital product marketplace, education center, and community forum. It supports user authentication, seamless payment integration via Bootpay, and extensive role-based features for visitors, buyers, sellers, administrators, and community participants.
core_goals: Provide a secure and flexible authentication system supporting multiple providers.
Offer a rich digital marketplace with advanced search, filtering, and personalized AI recommendations.
Enable sellers to manage products, bundles, coupons, and view detailed analytics.
Support buyers with wishlist, purchase management, reviews, and multiple payment methods.
Facilitate active community engagement with posts, comments, reactions, and follow features.
Provide administrators with full control over users, products, settlements, refunds, and analytics.
Ensure multi-language support and accessible, responsive UI/UX design.
Implement robust testing including unit, integration, E2E, accessibility, and performance tests.
key_features: Multi-provider authentication with NextAuth.js (credentials, GitHub, Google).
Digital product marketplace featuring search, filtering, categories, and product details.
Education center hosting tutorials with filtering and markdown content support.
Community forum with posts, comments, reactions, follows, and Q&A sections.
Bootpay payment integration supporting seven payment methods (cards, KakaoPay, NaverPay, TossPay, mobile payments, bank transfers, virtual accounts).
User dashboards for managing purchases, products, analytics, reviews, and settings.
Admin panel for user and product management, including statistics, settlements, refunds, and coupon control.
Seller-specific features: product registration wizard, bundle and coupon management, response to reviews and Q&As, and sales analytics.
AI-powered personalized recommendations and content feed.
Cloudinary integration for image uploads and management.
Notifications with push subscription support and comprehensive settings.
Internationalization supporting Korean and English languages.
Static legal pages and FAQ with filtering and search.
Comprehensive error handling, access control, and session management.
user_flow_summary: Visitors explore public pages like homepage, marketplace, education center, community, and FAQ without authentication.
Visitors can sign up or log in via email/password or OAuth providers.
Buyers search and filter products, add items to wishlist, make purchases using Bootpay with multiple payment options, and download purchased content.
Sellers create and manage digital products stepwise (basic info, detailed description, pricing, files, tutorials), view sales analytics, manage bundles and coupons, and respond to reviews and Q&A.
Community users create, edit, and delete posts, add comments and replies, react to posts, and follow sellers.
Administrators access a secure admin dashboard to manage users, products, settlements, refunds, and perform exports.
Users manage profiles, notification settings, and receive push notifications.
AI chatbot provides interactive support for logged-in users.
Multi-language and responsive UI ensure seamless experience across devices and locales.
Robust API endpoints support CRUD operations, authentication, and analytics for tailored user experiences.
validation_criteria: All public and authenticated API endpoints must return correct HTTP status codes and JSON responses.
Authentication flows for credentials and OAuth providers must securely create and manage sessions.
Bootpay payment flows and webhook handlers are expected to handle success, failure, cancellation, and refunds accurately.
Purchases, reviews, wishlist manipulations must reflect in the database and UI consistently without duplicates or unauthorized access.
Role-based access control ensures users cannot access unauthorized pages or APIs.
Admin functionalities for user, product, settlement, refund, coupon, and bundle management must update database states and trigger corresponding notifications or exports correctly.
UI components resize and reflow properly for mobile, tablet, desktop, and large screens with accessibility standards met.
Internationalization keys are properly loaded and translations applied with locale persistence.
File uploads via Cloudinary and Supabase must obey size and format constraints with correct URLs returned.
Automated tests cover unit, integration, E2E, accessibility, and performance aspects with results matching test case specifications.
